content: Compose a poem about rainbows using only words that start with "ra".

Rapturous rainbows radiate resplendent rays, ravishing retina. Rampant rain relinquishes, revealing radiant arc above. Rare, ravishing spectacle arrests, rapturously arousing awe. Rampant rain retreats, restoring radiance, reanimating all. Rampant renaissance reignites, rekindling spirits, rapturously ascending. Rainbows, rare revelation, relentlessly reminding of resplendent possibilities.
